about.title: Who We Are
about.description: Al Eman Medical & Scientific Services is a leading provider of laboratory and scientific solutions in Egypt, specializing in chemicals, life sciences, laboratory media, and microbial reference strains, with over 30 years of experience in the market.

about_page.title: About Us
about_page.subtitle: Founded in 1995, Al Eman has built over 30 years of experience.
about_page.story_title: A leading provider of scientific and laboratory solutions
about_page.story_p1: Al Eman Medical & Scientific Services is one of Egypt’s leading providers of scientific and laboratory solutions, serving the pharmaceutical, food, healthcare, research, and regulatory sectors.
about_page.story_p2: Founded in 1995, Al Eman has built over 30 years of experience in supplying high-quality chemicals, microbiology products, laboratory media, reference strains, laboratory equipment, glassware, plasticware, and consumables.
about_page.story_p3: We support our clients with reliable products, strong technical knowledge, and the ability to deliver complete laboratory solutions from a single trusted source.
about_page.mission_desc: To be the trusted and leading provider of integrated scientific and laboratory solutions that support quality, accuracy, and compliance across all sectors we serve. We aim to help our clients achieve reliable results, improve their research, and meet the highest standards in their operations.
about_page.vision_desc: To become the first and most trusted choice in Egypt for chemicals, laboratory supplies, microbiology media, reference strains, and complete laboratory solutions, by delivering consistent quality, professional technical support, and dependable service.
about_page.experience_desc: With over 30 years of experience, Al Eman has built strong expertise in serving food industries, healthcare institutions, quality control laboratories, and research centers. Our long presence in the market reflects reliability, continuity, and a deep understanding of our clients’ needs.

values.expertise: Strong scientific knowledge and technical experience across all products and services.
values.reliability: Commitment to high-quality, approved, and trusted products.
values.integrity: Transparent, honest, and ethical business practices.
values.partnership: Building long-term relationships, not short-term transactions.
values.support: Continuous support before and after sales to ensure our clients’ success.
